message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Consider that the value of the money decreases for me each round.
Your split was a bit too far in your favor, Alice. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in your favor to account for the decreasing value over time.  Let's close this out.
Bob, I acknowledge your previous offer but I need a bit more security. The money's value diminishes rapidly for me. This is my final offer.
